caption: The image is a promotional poster for National Wear Red Day, which is an event aimed at raising awareness for heart disease. The poster features a heart made of two hands, symbolizing the support and care for those affected by the disease. The event is scheduled for February 04, 2022, and there is a free entry option available. The website for more information is [www.reallygreatsite.com](http://www.reallygreatsite.com).
original_title: SOFT PINK RED NATIONAL WEAR RED DAY (Instagram Story)
